Participants/ team representatives are now able to join the game via the /join command. I will send a notification when participants join, as well as when all participants have joined.

Open the scoring gSheets here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Hjlmt2Xe7579b4ym9NkdDEE56T5sW6EwXJQGAF_tUqk/

Writing and calculation of scores is automated; there is no need to edit anything in the spreadsheet.
